intake.title: Intake Form
intake.subtitle: Complete this form to book your free reading screening session.

learningContext.title: Language & Learning Context
learningContext.elStatus: Currently or previously classified as English Learner (EL/ELL)
learningContext.speechHistoryPlaceholder: Any speech therapy, language delays, etc.
learningContext.speechHistoryDescription: Note any speech therapy, language delays, or communication concerns
learningContext.visionHearingPlaceholder: e.g., Passed school screening, wears glasses
learningContext.visionHearingDescription: When were they last checked? Any concerns?
learningContext.attendance: Frequent absences or school changes that may have impacted learning

concerns.title: Primary Reading Concerns
concerns.letterSounds: Letter Sounds (difficulty connecting letters to sounds)
concerns.phonological: Phonological Awareness (rhyming, syllables, sounds in words)

supports.title: Current School Supports
supports.description: What supports is the student currently receiving?

observations.interventionsPlaceholder: Describe any reading programs, tutoring, or interventions that have been tried...
observations.interventionsDescription: What has been tried at home or school?
observations.parentObsPlaceholder: Describe specific reading behaviors you've observed...
observations.parentObsDescription: Share specific examples of reading challenges you've observed

goal.title: What is your primary goal for this screening?
goal.schoolSupport: I want help getting support from the school
goal.evalGuidance: I want guidance on whether to request a formal evaluation
goal.fullReport: I want a comprehensive report I can share

otherConcerns.title: Please check any other specific areas of concern
otherConcerns.math: Difficulty with Math (Counting, calculations, word problems)
otherConcerns.social: Social Skills (Difficulty making friends, understanding social cues)
otherConcerns.anxiety: Anxiety (Excessive worry about school or performance)
otherConcerns.avoidance: Avoidance (Refuses to go to school or engage in learning tasks)
otherConcerns.sensory: Sensory Issues (Sensitive to loud noises, textures, or lights)

intake.additionalInfo: Is there anything else we should know?
intake.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Any additional information that might be helpful...

consent.screeningText: I understand this is an educational screening, not a clinical diagnosis. I consent to my child participating in this virtual reading screening session.
consent.dataText: I consent to having screening results and session data stored securely for the purpose of generating reports and recommendations.
consent.recordText: I consent to having the Zoom session recorded for quality assurance and training purposes. Recordings are stored securely and deleted after 30 days.

session.inPersonNote: Note: In-person testing will occur in a designated library space to ensure a quiet, neutral environment.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Please select the time blocks that work best for you

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.concernsRequired: Please select at least one concern
validation.consentData: You must consent to data storage

success.title: Intake form submitted!
success.description: Now let's schedule your screening session.
